snippet: An official said President Obama would seek to reassure King Abdullah of Saudi Arabia after a period of tension over American policies toward Iran and Syria.
abstract: Pres Obama plans to travel to Saudi Arabia in March 2014 for a meeting with King Abdullah, trip meant to mend a frayed relationship with a major American ally in the Middle East.
lead_paragraph: An official said President Obama would seek to reassure King Abdullah of Saudi Arabia after a period of tension over American policies toward Iran and Syria.

headline.main: Obama Is Said to Plan Fence-Mending Trip to Saudi Arabia
headline.print_headline: Obama Is Said to Plan Fence-Mending Trip to Saudi Arabia
